Page subtitle

We are going to borrow less from current Alloy, and borrow heavily from Heydon Pickering's Inclusive Components https://inclusive-components.design because Brandon Trust site will aim for Level AA accessibility and use WCAG guidelines.

Accordions and interactive components will use Inclusive Components as a guide first, so some HTML markup will be sparse

Example accordion (Javascript and functionality not yet added, so it doesn't yet work):
https://inclusive-components.design/collapsible-sections/

Nullam tortor metus, tincidunt ut urna id, posuere placerat orci. Ut quis risus dictum risus facilisis imperdiet quis sed eros.
